description: '''Nicolae Neacșu''' (1924, in Isaccea, Tulcea – 3 September 2002, in Clejani, Giurgiu) was a Romanian [[lăutar]], an important member of the [[Taraf de Haïdouks]], a well-known [[Roma in Romania|Romani]] band from [[Clejani]], [[Romania]]. He was considered to be one of the best Romani violinists in the world. His main disciple was Gheorghe "Caliu" Anghel, who still plays in the Taraf de Haïdouks.
